30namespace wasm {
31class ErrorThrower;
32enum Suspend : int { kSuspend, kSuspendWithSuspender, kNoSuspend };
33enum Promise : int { kPromise, kPromiseWithSuspender, kNoPromise };
34struct WasmModule;
35
36// Calls to Wasm imports are handled in several different ways, depending on the
37// type of the target function/callable and whether the signature matches the
38// argument arity.
39// TODO(jkummerow): Merge kJSFunctionArity{Match,Mismatch}, we don't really
40// need the distinction any more.
41enum class ImportCallKind : uint8_t {
42 kLinkError, // static Wasm->Wasm type error
43 kRuntimeTypeError, // runtime Wasm->JS type error
44 kWasmToCapi, // fast Wasm->C-API call
45 kWasmToJSFastApi, // fast Wasm->JS Fast API C call
46 kWasmToWasm, // fast Wasm->Wasm call
47 kJSFunctionArityMatch, // fast Wasm->JS call
48 kJSFunctionArityMismatch, // Wasm->JS, needs adapter frame
49 // Math functions imported from JavaScript that are intrinsified
50 kFirstMathIntrinsic,
51 kF64Acos = kFirstMathIntrinsic,
52 kF64Asin,
53 kF64Atan,
54 kF64Cos,
55 kF64Sin,
56 kF64Tan,
57 kF64Exp,
58 kF64Log,
59 kF64Atan2,
60 kF64Pow,
61 kF64Ceil,
62 kF64Floor,
63 kF64Sqrt,
64 kF64Min,
65 kF64Max,
66 kF64Abs,
67 kF32Min,
68 kF32Max,
69 kF32Abs,
70 kF32Ceil,
71 kF32Floor,
72 kF32Sqrt,
73 kF32ConvertF64,
74 kLastMathIntrinsic = kF32ConvertF64,
75 // For everything else, there's the call builtin.
76 kUseCallBuiltin
77};
78
79constexpr ImportCallKind kDefaultImportCallKind =
80 ImportCallKind::kJSFunctionArityMatch;
81
82// Resolves which import call wrapper is required for the given JS callable.
83// Provides the kind of wrapper needed, the ultimate target callable, and the
84// suspender object if applicable. Note that some callables (e.g. a
85// {WasmExportedFunction} or {WasmJSFunction}) just wrap another target, which
86// is why the ultimate target is provided as well.
87class WasmImportData {
88 public:
89 V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE WasmImportData(
90 Handle<WasmTrustedInstanceData> trusted_instance_data, int func_index,
91 Handle<JSReceiver> callable, const wasm::FunctionSig* sig,
92 uint32_t expected_canonical_type_index, WellKnownImport preknown_import);
93
94 ImportCallKind kind() const { return kind_; }
95 WellKnownImport well_known_status() const { return well_known_status_; }
96 Suspend suspend() const { return suspend_; }
97 Handle<JSReceiver> callable() const { return callable_; }
98
99 private:
100 ImportCallKind ComputeKind(
101 Handle<WasmTrustedInstanceData> trusted_instance_data, int func_index,
102 const wasm::FunctionSig* expected_sig,
103 uint32_t expected_canonical_type_index, WellKnownImport preknown_import);
104
105 ImportCallKind kind_;
106 WellKnownImport well_known_status_{WellKnownImport::kGeneric};
107 Suspend suspend_{kNoSuspend};
108 Handle<JSReceiver> callable_;
109};
110
111MaybeHandle<WasmInstanceObject> InstantiateToInstanceObject(
112 Isolate* isolate, ErrorThrower* thrower,
113 Handle<WasmModuleObject> module_object, MaybeHandle<JSReceiver> imports,
114 MaybeHandle<JSArrayBuffer> memory);
115
116// Initializes a segment at index {segment_index} of the segment array of
117// {instance}. If successful, returns the empty {Optional}, otherwise an
118// {Optional} that contains the error message. Exits early if the segment is
119// already initialized.
120base::Optional<MessageTemplate> InitializeElementSegment(
121 Zone* zone, Isolate* isolate,
122 Handle<WasmTrustedInstanceData> trusted_instance_data,
123 Handle<WasmTrustedInstanceData> shared_trusted_instance_data,
124 uint32_t segment_index);
125
126V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE void CreateMapForType(
127 Isolate* isolate, const WasmModule* module, int type_index,
128 Handle<WasmInstanceObject> instance_object,
129 Handle<FixedArray> maybe_shared_maps);
130
131// A union tagged on the code-kind for wrapper graph building data. The rest of
132// the wrapper compilation pipeline is independent of the code kind.
133struct WrapperCompilationInfo {
134 CodeKind code_kind;
135 StubCallMode stub_mode;
136 union {
137 bool is_import;
138 struct {
139 wasm::ImportCallKind import_kind;
140 int expected_arity;
141 wasm::Suspend suspend;
142 } wasm_js_info;
143 };
144};
